alert.note: Alert for Escambia (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 20 at 10:33AM CDT until March 24 at 3:00PM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Alabama...Florida... Escambia River Near Century affecting Escambia County. For the Escambia River...including Century...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL THURSDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Escambia River Near Century. * WHEN...Until Thursday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 17.0 feet, Considerable flooding of lowlands. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:05 AM CDT Sunday the stage was 16.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to continue to rise to above flood stage this afternoon. The river will then crest at a stage of 17.8 feet Monday evening. It will then begin to fall, falling below flood stage early Thursday afternoon. - Flood stage is 17.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/mob. The next statement will be issued when updates occur.
